title: 19 Best Black Friday Deals on Bedding for Your Holiday Shopping
description: Don’t sleep on these holiday deals. Now is the best time to upgrade your bedding and save big on pillows, comforters, sheets and more.
author: Aly Lopez
excerpt: Don’t sleep on these holiday deals. Now is the best time to upgrade your bedding and save big on pillows, comforters, sheets and more.
text: Black Friday and Cyber Monday are almost here. If you're looking to get a headstart on those holiday shopping lists while saving big, you can find huge discounts across tons of categories, from toys to tech gadgets to mattresses. These holiday sales also offer some great opportunities to upgrade your bedding. Right now, you can score significant discounts on cozy bedding that will keep you warm throughout the colder months.Our CNET sleep team has tested mattresses, sleep products and bedding for years. We know the difference between worthwhile deals and which sales to sleep on. Below are the top Black Friday sales on pillows, sheets, comforters and more for the best rest possible.This list of deals is updated regularly, so be sure to check back for more. Who knows when you'll find the perfect price to grab something special for the holidays? Cozy Earth This holiday season, you can save up to 35% off Cozy Earth's premium bedding, bath collection and apparel. If you're looking for a super soft bedding set made from 100% premium viscose from bamboo, check out Cozy Earth's Bamboo Bedding Deluxe Bundle. Its Black Friday sale will save you hundreds, dropping the price for a queen-size set to $681 from $1,047.Leaning on the more affordable side, the best-selling regular Bamboo Sheet Set is also 35% off, bringing the price from $331 to $216. As part of Cozy Earth's Black Friday promotion, you can get free shipping on orders over $50. Tuft & Needle During its Black Friday sale, Tuft & Needle is offering up to 25% off pillows, mattress protectors, toppers, duvet inserts, bedding, quilts and more. That brings the price of its high-quality queen-size mattress protector from $90 to $72 and its soft, breathable quilt from $220 to $176 for a queen. Caroline Igo/CNET Brooklyn Bedding's mattresses and bedding accessories frequently appear on CNET's best lists. The brand's Luxury Cooling Pillow was voted the best cooling memory foam pillow by our sleep experts, and right now, you can save $39 and get one for $90. Brooklyn Bedding also offers frames, foundations and adjustable power bases that you can save hundreds on this holiday season. All you have to do is use code BFRIDAY30 to get 30% off at checkout. Brooklinen Brooklinen's Black Friday sale offers savings of 25% off sitewide (after signing in with an email address). It also includes special savings of up to 50% off select bedding bundles, which include a sheet set, duvet cover and pillowcases. This deal will take the price for a queen-size bundle from $427 to $256 (depending on your chosen material).If you're like me and don't want a flat sheet, you can save 20% on the brand's No Flat Sheet Set. I recently purchased the Luxe Sateen set and love it, currently offered for $71 rather than $119. Brooklinen's Down Comforter also earned a spot on our Best Comforters of 2024 list, and right now, you can get a queen-size for $285 (typically $379). Sheets & Giggles Sheets & Giggles is offering up to 50% off sitewide. This sale includes its Eucalyptus sheet set, which our experts chose as the best sheet for hot sleepers. This Black Friday, you can save a large chunk of change and get a queen-size set of these 100% eucalyptus lyocell sheets for $95 rather than $190. Sleep Number This Black Friday, bedding such as sheets, pillowcases and pillows at Sleep Number are buy one, get one 50% off, and blankets are up to 25% off retail price. You can bring home two of the brand's popular ComfortFit Pillows for $100 rather than $200. This pillow comes in three different shapes, and the ultimate model has removable inserts so you can customize it to your personal support and height needs.Similarly, Sleep Number's Create Your Perfect Comforter was given a 2024 CNET Editors' Choice Award for its customizable ability to accommodate couples with differing sleep preferences. Crane & Canopy Crane & Canopy is offering 20% off sitewide through Dec. 3 using the code CHEER24 at checkout. If you want to add texture to your bedroom setup, check out the brand's luxurious and lightweight Waffle Blanket, which currently costs $111 for a queen-size rather than its usual $139.Crane & Canopy's duvet covers, comforters and sheets come in a variety of fun patterns and color options, such as the adorable striped French Blue Larkin Duvet Cover, now priced at $143, down from $179. Aly Lopez/CNET I rest my head on the Cloud Cirrus Pillows from Bear every night, and I absolutely love them. Using code BLACK35, you can save $52 and get a two-pack of these fluffy and comfortable pillows for $98. In addition to beds, Bear's bedding, including mattress protectors, toppers and sheets, is also 35% off this Black Friday. Caroline Igo/CNET Buffy Buffy's Black Friday bedding sale offers savings of at least 25% on everything on its site. I sleep on the Buffy Breeze Sheet Set and am impressed by how silky and soft these luxurious cooling sheets are. Currently marked down to $146, you'll save nearly $50 on a queen set. Buffy's sheets also come in a ton of fun colorways, so there's a design to match any bedroom.The light and fluffy Buffy Cloud Comforter, chosen as CNET's best overall comforter of 2024, is also marked down from $195 to $146 this holiday season. Leesa Sleep Leesa Sleep's Black Friday sale will save you 25% on bedding and bases. The brand's breathable and chunky 10-pound Hand-Knit Weighted Blanket is currently $50 off, marked at $149, and its hypoallergenic and machine-washable Duvet Comforter is now $141 rather than $189 for a queen. Nest Bedding Nest Bedding offers some of our favorite eco-friendly bedding, such as comforters, sheets and pillows. Nest even appeared on our best dog beds of 2024 list after Louie, one of our resident furry sleep experts, tested and approved the brand's dog bed.With its Black Friday sale, you can get 20% off select bedding, including the popular shredded foam Easy Breather Pillow, which is priced at $95 rather than $119. To adjust the pillow to your perfect size, all you have to do is add or remove some of the filling. Purple Purple, another brand on many of our best lists, is offering 20% off its bedding and pillows. Dillon Payne, CNET director of video production and sleep expert, says the Purple SoftStretch Sheets are his all-time favorite. This Black Friday, you can take home a set for $183 rather than $229. The Purple Harmony Pillow, typically $199, is now $179. You can add the Purple SoftStretch Sheets and save 25%, taking the bundle price from $428 to $320. My Sheets Rock Our experts crowned the Regulator Sheet Set from My Sheets Rock the best bamboo bed sheets. Made of 100% bamboo rayon, they're light, stretchy, breathable and great at wicking moisture away if you tend to sleep hot. Enter the code EPIC24 at checkout to take 20% off your order this Black Friday. This means you'll get a queen-size set for $159 rather than $199 and its Regulator Comforter -- also made with high-grade bamboo rayon fill -- for $199 rather than $249. This sale ends Dec. 3. Amazon If you're looking for a cozy heated blanket to cuddle up with this winter season, check out the Sunbeam Royal Luxe Microplush Heated Blanket, chosen as our top-rated heated blanket.
